name: Speech-F
tagline: HTML 5 Media Player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature
body:
### Welcome to Speech-F project. Speech-F is a HTML5 Media player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature. Anybody can use Speech-F media player to upload video/audio files to their website using simple HTML snippets, to make the media content both searchable and taggable. ### Demo [Tron Video](http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/trondemo.html)
[HTML5 Lecture Video](http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/lecturedemo.html) ### Authors and Contributors Currently Speech-F project is owned and maintained by @shiva2110 .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
